modDesc.title: J.R. Hoback Jr. Memorial Headstone
modDesc.description: A handcrafted 3D model of the J.R. Hoback Jr. memorial headstone. Designed and modeled in honor of family heritage and local history. This decorative monument can be placed anywhere on your farm under Build Mode → Decorations → Other.
